author: sky.cactus
content: <@552133098075193354> I have heard a rumor that Dancun mainnet date has been announced, but <#595701770034872362> doesn't agree.  Did you forget to announce it everywhere, or is a date not actually solidified yet?

author: abcoathup
content:
Dencun mainnet date is March 13 epoch 269568
https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7569#activation

As I understand it, an EF blog post announcing the upgrade is planned to go out once we have all the mainnet client releases (see: https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1209621975744516168) and a mainnet shadow fork is successful with those releases.  This should be the end of the week unless an issue crops up.
